collection.name: employee_profile_collection
collection.prototype: select p.id, r.name as region, pb.name, pb.description, CASE WHEN pb.availability=0 THEN 'Я не знаю' WHEN pb.availability=1 THEN 'Менее 30 час\неделю' WHEN pb.availability=2 THEN 'Более 30 час\неделю' ELSE 'other' END AS availability, CASE WHEN pb.expertise_level=0 THEN 'Начальный' WHEN pb.expertise_level=1 THEN 'Средний' WHEN pb.expertise_level=2 THEN 'Эксперт' ELSE 'other' END AS expertise_level, CASE WHEN pb.employment_type=0 THEN 'Удаленно' WHEN pb.employment_type=1 THEN 'Частично удаленно' WHEN pb.employment_type=2 THEN 'В офисе' ELSE 'other' END AS employment_type, CASE WHEN pb.employment_period=0 THEN 'Менее недели' WHEN pb.employment_period=1 THEN 'Менее 1 месяца' WHEN pb.employment_period=2 THEN 'От 1 до 3 месяцев' WHEN pb.employment_period=3 THEN 'От 3 до 6 месяцев' WHEN pb.employment_period=4 THEN 'Более 6 месяцев' ELSE 'other' END AS employment_period, CASE WHEN pb.composition=0 THEN 'Вольный стрелок' WHEN pb.composition=1 THEN 'Компания' ELSE 'other' END AS composition, CASE WHEN pb.territory=0 THEN 'Город' WHEN pb.territory=1 THEN 'Регион' ELSE 'other' END AS territory, pb.publication_date, pb.cancellation_date, prs.login from employee_profile p join profile_base pb on pb.id=p.id left join regions r on r.id=pb.region left join person prs on prs.id=p.person ::from-clause WHERE 1=1 ::where-clause
